name: Gold fume flower opal pendant
description:
This beautiful hand blown pendant is made with love in Berkeley, California. Made with fumed gold that comes out pink from the heat, a special glass loop, and an encased opal, this borosilicate glass art will impress you and loved ones alike. Each piece is unique and made to order with precision and dedication.

This pendant has a darker colored glass loop for stringing on necklaces or as a charm. The light weight is comfortable to wear and smooth to the touch. It will surely be a great statement piece. 

Each piece signed and dated by artist. :)
Thank you for the support #tydyeglass

name: Jellyfish Fumed 24k Gold Pendant
description:
This pendant was made by trapping real 24k gold with clear glass and imploding it into clear glass. The pink spirals are 24k gold. The top of the pendant include beautiful sparkly blue stardust. 

Each piece signed and dated by artist. 
Made with love in Berkeley, California. Enjoy!

name: Amber Purple Glass Turtle Pendant
description:
This beautiful hand blown turtle pendant is made with love in Berkeley, California. Made with a amber purple glass finish, this borosilicate glass art will impress you and loved ones alike. Each piece is unique and made to order with precision and dedication.

This pendant has a lighter purple glass loop for stringing on necklaces or as a charm. The light turtle is comfortable to wear and smooth to the touch. It will surely be a great statement piece.

Turtles as we know are beautiful beings but also represent strength, protection, stability, and patience among other things. It will be a charming gift for anyone in your life.

Any custom piece will be happily accommodated - please leave a message :)
Each piece signed and dated by artist.
